All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, OnBalloonListener, OnMapListener
public class MyLocationOverlay
extends Overlay
implements OnBalloonListener, OnMapListener

MyLocationOverlay.java: Draws an overlay that designates the user's location on the map.
